Detailed Description

Implements ROS node "arm_control".

This node moves the arm based on commands from teleop nodes.

Copyright:
2012 University of Massachusetts Lowell
Author:
Jonathan Hasenzahl

void ArmControl::init ( ) [private]

Initializes the node.

First, the node's subscriptions are started. Then, the arm hardware is initialized. The arm is moved into its origin position, and then the node spins, waiting for movement callbacks. A shutdown flag will stop the spinning and cause the arm to move into its final position. The node will exit after the arm has finished moving.
